		<h2 style="font-size:18px; display: inline;">Your Source for <span class="emphasis">FREE</span> Online Bible Study Tools</h2>
		<p>Welcome to StudyLight.org, the largest collection of online Bible study tools and resources. We provide advanced Bible search and study tools for FREE so you can find Bible verses faster and then understand them better. StudyLight has more Bible commentaries, encyclopedias, dictionaries, lexicons and original language tools than any other website on the internet! Explore our site and benefit from all the amazing features and resources that will help to illuminate the Word of God like never before.</p>

					<p class="standard" style="margin: 0px;"><a href="//www.liveasif.org/lists/view.cgi?type=w&list=20070802001"><span class="subtitle">Bible and Quote August 13-17, 2012</span></a><br /><b>'Bible verse and quote'</b> from <i>Jan Couns</i></p>
					<p class="paragraph"> And now, Lord, for what do I wait? My hope is in You. Ps 39:7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Faith is that which, knowing the Lord&#39;s will, goes and does it; or, not knowing it, stands and waits, content in ignorance as in knowledge, because God wills - neither pressing into the hidden future, nor careless of the knowledge which&#133;(<a href="//www.liveasif.org/lists/view.cgi?type=w&list=20070802001">continue reading article</a>)</p>
				</div>
				<div>

					<p class="paragraph">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Green &ndash; the color of Ireland, the emerald isle; fostering the tradition of the wearing of green on St. Patrick&rsquo;s Day.&nbsp; Images of a pugnacious character, with a look of defiant determination on his face and shamrocks abound.&nbsp; Pride in being Irish is expressed in parades&#133;(<a href="//www.liveasif.org/lists/view.cgi?type=w&list=20060308001">continue reading article</a>)</p>

					<p class="paragraph">&nbsp; Pray &nbsp; She was deeply distressed and prayed to the LORD and wept bitterly. And she vowed a vow and said, &ldquo;LORD of hosts, if you will indeed look on the affliction of your servant and remember me and not forget your servant, but will give your servant as son, then I will give him to the LORD&#133;(<a href="//www.liveasif.org/lists/view.cgi?type=w&list=20110714002">continue reading article</a>)</p>

					<p style="margin: 5px 0px;"><span class="caption bold">Daily Light on the Daily Path</span><br /><a href="/devotionals/dlp/index.cgi?l=en&d=0316">Morning / Evening Devotional &#151; March 16</a></p>
<p>	 What is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.
	My days are swifter than a post: they flee away, they see no good. They are passed away as the swift ships: as the eagle that hasteth to the prey. &#151; Thou carriest them away as with a flood; they are as a sleep ... in the morning they are like grass&#133; &#151; ( <a href="/devotionals/dlp.html?date=0316">click here to read more</a> )</p>
				</div>

					<p style="margin: 5px 0px;"><span class="caption bold">Charles Spurgeon's "Faith's Checkbook"</span><br /><a href="/devotionals/fcb/index.cgi?l=en&d=0316">To Others an "Ensample"</a></p>
<p>"Those things, which ye have both learned, and received, and heard, and seen in Me, do: and the God of peace shall be with you." &nbsp;  Philippians 4:9
 It is well when a man can with advantage be so minutely copied as Paul might have been. Oh, for grace to imitate him this day and every day!
 Should we, through divine grace, carry into practice the Pauline&#133; &#151; ( <a href="/devotionals/fcb.html?date=0316">click here to read more</a> )</p>

<p>
<i>


"And David said in his heart, I shall now perish one day by the hand of Saul." 

- 1 Samuel 27:1

<p>	How large our problems loom in our eyes, but let's stop and gain a little perspective. Today's airplanes zoom us across the country at about 600 miles per hour. Seems pretty fast, until we think of the speed of light: 186,000 miles ...per second! At this mind-boggling speed, it would take us only a little over eight full minutes to travel the 93 million&#133; &#151; ( <a href="/devotionals/votl.html?date=adar_29">click here to read more</a> )</p>

<p>This past Sunday was the 150th Anniversary of the Minorsville Christian Church. The congregation I have the rich privilege to serve is steeped in history and accomplishments which, though not monumental, are important. The ministers in the church&#39;s history are a wonderful group of men who have served their Lord&#133;&#133; &#151; ( <a href="/devotionals/csr.html?date=0316">click here to read more</a> )</p>

Lewis put it like this: "The Pantheist&#39;s God does nothing, demands nothing. He is there if you wish for Him, like a book on a shelf. He will&#133;&#133; &#151; ( <a href="/devotionals/edl.html?date=0316">click here to read more</a> )</p>

<p>  The second question is: How many are worthy to hear His voice? In  <span class="scriptRef" ref="ac+13:46" translation="">Acts 13:46</span>b Paul and Barnabas told the people, &quot;Since you reject it . . . we now turn to the Gentiles.&quot; This is a terrible judgment. But here is the gist of what I want to say: A radical and sweeping reformation is imperative among the people called Christians--Protestants&#133;
&#133; &#151; ( <a href="/devotionals/toz.html?date=0316">click here to read more</a> )</p>
				</div>
				<div>
					<p style="margin: 5px 0px;"><span class="caption bold">The Believer's Daily Remembrancer</span><br /><a href="/devotionals/rem/index.cgi?l=en&d=0316">Thy God reigneth!&quot;   Isaiah 52:7</a></p>
<p> <p align="center" class="bold">Thy God reigneth!&quot;  <span class="scriptRef" ref="isa+52:7" translation="">Isaiah 52:7</span></p> <p>JESUS has power over all flesh. He is upon the throne of the universe. He superintends all things. His will cannot be frustrated. His designs must be accomplished. Nothing is left to chance. His hand is in every event. He rules over the world by His power. He rules in the church by His word. He rules in the&#133;</p>

toggleMenu=function(e){
	$(".nav_menu").children().each(function(t){
		if(t==e){
			var n=$(this).hasClass("clicked")?0:e==7?280:60;
			var r=$(this);
			if($(this).hasClass("clicked")){
				$(".sub-navigation").animate({
					height:n+"px"
				},75,"swing",function(){
					$("#subMenu_"+t).hide();
					r.removeClass("clicked");
					$(this).hide()
				})
			}else{
				$(".sub-navigation").show().animate({
					height:n+"px"
				},75,"swing",function(){
					$("#subMenu_"+t).show();
					r.addClass("clicked")
				})
			}
		}else{
			$("#subMenu_"+t).hide();
			$(this).removeClass("clicked")
		}
	})
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">

var current_search_query1 = '';
var current_search_query2 = '';
var current_searchTranslation1 = 'en_nas';
var current_searchTranslation2 = 'en_nas';
var current_searchTranslation3 = 'str_nas';
var current_searchSection = '';

$(document).ready(function(){
	$('#devotionals_static').loopedCarousel({ items: 1 });
	$(function(){
		$('#christianpost_newsfeed').loopedCarousel({ items: 2 });
	});
	$('#read_now').click(function(){
		var t1 = $('#read_t1').val();
		var bk = $('#read_bk').val();
		var ch = $('#read_ch').val();
		window.location.href='/bible/' + t1 + '/' + bk + '/' + ch + '.html';
		return false;
	});
	$('#study_now').click(function(){
		var bk = $('#study_bk').val();
		var ch = $('#study_ch').val();
		window.location.href='/interlinear-bible/' + bk + '/' + ch + '.html';
		return false;
	});
	$('#read_t1').change(function(){
		var valid_books = $(this).find('option:selected').data('vb');
		$('#read_bk option').each(function(){
			var bn = $(this).data('bn');
			if(valid_books == 1){
				if(bn > 38){
					$(this).css('disabled',true);
				} else {
					$(this).attr('disabled',false);
				}
				if(bn == 0){
					$(this).attr('selected','selected');
					 var chapter_max = $(this).data('cm');
					$('#read_ch option').remove();
					for(var i = 1; i <= chapter_max; i++){
						$('#read_ch').append($('<option/>', {
							value: i,
							text : 'Chapter ' + i
						}));
					}
				}
			}
			if(valid_books == 2){
				if(bn < 39){
					$(this).attr('disabled',true);
				} else {
					$(this).attr('disabled',false);
				}
				if(bn == 39){
					$(this).attr('selected','selected');
					 var chapter_max = $(this).data('cm');
					$('#read_ch option').remove();
					for(var i = 1; i <= chapter_max; i++){
						$('#read_ch').append($('<option/>', {
							value: i,
							text : 'Chapter ' + i
						}));
					}
				}
			}
			if(valid_books == 3){
				$(this).attr('disabled',false);
				if(bn == 0){
					$(this).attr('selected','selected');
					 var chapter_max = $(this).data('cm');
					$('#read_ch option').remove();
					for(var i = 1; i <= chapter_max; i++){
						$('#read_ch').append($('<option/>', {
							value: i,
							text : 'Chapter ' + i
						}));
					}
				}
			}
		});
	});
	$('#read_bk').change(function(){
		var chapter_max = $(this).find('option:selected').data('cm');
		$('#read_ch option').remove();
		for(var i = 1; i <= chapter_max; i++){
			$('#read_ch').append($('<option/>', {
				value: i,
				text : 'Chapter ' + i
			}));
		}
	});
	$('#study_bk').change(function(){
		var chapter_max = $(this).find('option:selected').data('cm');
		$('#study_ch option').remove();
		for(var i = 1; i <= chapter_max; i++){
			$('#study_ch').append($('<option/>', {
				value: i,
				text : 'Chapter ' + i
			}));
		}
	});
	$('#search_form').submit(function(){
		if($('#t1').val().indexOf('str_')> -1){
			document.forms[0].action = '/desk/interlinear.cgi';
		}
		if(($("#q1").val().indexOf('Topic to start')!= -1)||($("#q1").val().length < 3)){
			alert('Sorry but you must enter a word, \nphrase or reference in the search box\nand it must be more than two letters in length');
			return false ;
		}
		return true ;
	});

       $('.selector').click(function(){
		$('.progress').show();
		var dir = $(this).attr('id');
		var search_form_type = $('#search_form_type').val();
		//$('#searchType_image:visible').fadeOut();
		if($('#q1').val().indexOf('Enter a Bible Verse')< 0){current_search_query1 = $('#q1').val();}
		if($('#q2').length){current_search_query2 = $('#q2').val();}
		if($('#t1').length){current_searchTranslation1 = $('#t1').val();}
		if($('#t2').length){current_searchTranslation2 = $('#t2').val();}
		if($('#t3').length){current_searchTranslation3 = $('#t3').val();}
		current_searchSection = $('#s').val();
		$.ajax({
			url : '//' + window.location.hostname + '/ajax/search_box.cgi',
			data : {
				'dir'			: dir,
				'search_form_type'	: search_form_type,
				'kbs'			: $.isFunction(window.show_keyb)
			},
			success : function(b){
				$('#searchbox_title').fadeOut(200, function(){
					$(this).text($(b).find('title').text());
				}).fadeIn();
				$('#search_form').fadeOut(200, function(){
					$(this).html($(b).find('form').text());
					if(current_search_query1 != ''){$('#q1').val(current_search_query1);}
					if($('#q2').length&& current_search_query2 != ''){$('#q2').val(current_search_query2);}
					if($('#t1').length&& current_searchTranslation1 != ''){ $('#t1').val(current_searchTranslation1); }
					if($('#t2').length){$('#t2').val(current_searchTranslation2);}
					if($('#t3').length){$('#t3').val(current_searchTranslation3);}
					$('#s').val(current_searchSection);
				}).fadeIn();
				$('.progress').hide();
			}
		});
	});

});
</script>
